<small>Aramaic form: [[H8000]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלֵם‎</span>]<sub>103</sub> **verb** ==be complete, sound== (Late Hebrew ***id.*** ([[BDB#Jastr|Jastr]]), Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שלם‎</span> Pi\`el ***complete, requite***, especially in proper name, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>376</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|GACooke]]<sup>99, also 81, 111, etc.</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be safe, secure, free from fault***, II. ***make over, resign to***, IV. ***resign*** or ***submit oneself***, especially to God, whence participle ***Muslim***, and infinitive <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Isl¹m***</u></abbr> properly ***submission*** to God; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šalâmu, be complete, unharmed, be paid;***</u></abbr> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁלֵים‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be complete, safe***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] ***peaceful***; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שלם‎</span> ***reward, repay*** (Pa; in proper name); compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סלם‎</span> ***peace*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 124</sup>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***safety, security***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šulmu, welfare;***</u></abbr> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>322</sup> ***security peace***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁלָמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***security, welfare***, Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שלם‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>376</sup>, especially = ***submission***, in proper name [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>Sem.79 f.</sup>; [[BDB#Bondi|Bondi]]<sup>70</sup> (after Brugsch), compare <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šarm¹***</u></abbr>, ***greet, do homage***, as loan-word in Egyptian); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָֽׁלְמוּ‎</span> [[Isa.60.20|Isa 60:20]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּשְׁלָ֑ם‎</span> [[Job.9.4|Job 9:4]] feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּשְׁלַם‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.51|1Kgs 7:51]] + 2 t.; — 

**1.** ***be complete, finished, ended:*** temple [[1Kgs.7.51|1Kgs 7:51]] = [[2Chr.5.1|2Chr 5:1]] walls of city [[Neh.6.15|Neh 6:15]] of time [[Isa.60.20|Isa 60:20]]. 

**2.** ***be sound, uninjured***, [[Job.9.4|Job 9:4]]. **Pi\`el**<sub>89</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלַּם‎</span> [[Lev.5.24|Lev 5:24]] +, 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֫י‎</span> [[Jer.16.18|Jer 16:18]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁלֵּם‎</span> [[Exod.21.34|Exod 21:34]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁלְּמֶ֑נָּה‎</span> [[Lev.24.18|Lev 24:18]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלֵּם‎</span> [[Eccl.5.3|Eccl 5:3]] + [[Eccl.50.14|Eccl 50:14]], etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁלֵּם‎</span> [[Exod.21.36|Exod 21:36]] +; construct ***id.*** [[Prov.22.27|Prov 22:27]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁלֵּם‎</span> [[Deut.7.10|Deut 7:10]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***complete, finish***, temple [[1Kgs.9.25|1Kgs 9:25]]. 

**2.** ***make safe***, with accusative [[Job.8.6|Job 8:6]]. 

**3.** ***make whole*** or ***good, restore*** thing lost [[Joel.2.25|Joel 2:25]], or stolen [[Exod.21.37|Exod 21:37]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); pay a debt [[2Kgs.4.7|2Kgs 4:7]]; [[Ps.37.21|Ps 37:21]]; [[Prov.22.27|Prov 22:27]]; [[Job.41.3|Job 41:3]] ***make compensation***, for injury [[Lev.24.18|Lev 24:18]]; [[Lev.24.21|Lev 24:21]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); for trespass in sacred things [[Lev.5.16|Lev 5:16]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). 

**4.** ***make good***, i.e. ***pay***, vows, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶדֶר‎</span> [[Deut.23.22|Deut 23:22]]; [[2Sam.15.7|2Sam 15:7]] + 9 t., + (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> to God) [[Ps.50.14|Ps 50:14]]; [[Ps.66.13|Ps 66:13]]; [[Ps.116.14|Ps 116:14]]; [[Ps.116.18|Ps 116:18]] object omitted [[Ps.76.12|Ps 76:12]] absolute [[Isa.19.21|Isa 19:21]] with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּוֺדוֺת‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> to God [[Ps.56.13|Ps 56:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פרים שׂפתינו‎</span> [[Hos.14.3|Hos 14:3]]. 

**5.** ***requite, recompense, reward***, good [[1Sam.24.20|1Sam 24:20]]; [[Ruth.2.12|Ruth 2:12]] evil [[Isa.65.6|Isa 65:6]]; [[Jer.51.56|Jer 51:56]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Deut.7.10|Deut 7:10]] + 4 t., + (with accusative of thing) [[Jer.51.24|Jer 51:24]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אל‎</span> person [[Job.21.19|Job 21:19]] acc of thing [[Prov.20.22|Prov 20:22]]; [[Jer.16.18|Jer 16:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלַּם גְּמוּל לְ‎</span> [[Isa.59.18|Isa 59:18]] (twice in verse) (but see  I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁלֵּם‎</span>), [[Isa.66.6|Isa 66:6]] + (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּמוּל‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעַל לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Job.34.11|Job 34:11]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּמוּל עַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Joel.4.4|Joel 4:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל חֵיק‎</span> [[Isa.65.6|Isa 65:6]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלחַֿיק‎</span> [[Jer.32.18|Jer 32:18]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כ‎</span> of deeds, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> ***reward according to one's works*** [[2Sam.3.39|2Sam 3:39]] + 3 t.; accusative of person [[Ps.31.24|Ps 31:24]] accusative of thing <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה תחת טובה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.44.4|Gen 44:4]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) + [[Gen.35.12|Gen 35:12]]; [[Gen.38.21|Gen 38:21]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁלְּמֵנִי‎</span>). **Pu\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׁלַּם‎</span> [[Ps.65.2|Ps 65:2]]; [[Jer.18.20|Jer 18:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשֻׁלָּ֑ם‎</span> [[Prov.11.31|Prov 11:31]]; [[Prov.13.13|Prov 13:13]] — 

**1.** ***be performed***, of vow [[Ps.65.2|Ps 65:2]]. 

**2.** ***be repaid, requited***, [[Jer.18.20|Jer 18:20]]; [[Prov.11.31|Prov 11:31]]; [[Prov.13.13|Prov 13:13]]. 

**Hiph\`il 1.** ***complete, perform: Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁלִים‎</span> [[Job.23.14|Job 23:14]]; [[Isa.44.26|Isa 44:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁלִם‎</span> V:28. 

**2.** ***make an end of***, 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּשְׁלִימֵנִי‎</span> [[Isa.38.12|Isa 38:12]]; [[Isa.38.13|Isa 38:13]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] ***deliver up*** to pains, as in Aramaic). 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַם‎</span>] **verb denominative** ==be in covenant of peace==;-**Qal** ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלָ֑ם‎</span> [[Job.22.21|Job 22:21]] ***be at peace*** (in covt.); ***Participle*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺלְמִי‎</span> [[Ps.7.5|Ps 7:5]] i.e. my ally, friend (compare [[Ps.41.10|Ps 41:10]]); ***Participle pass*** construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלֻמֵי‎</span> [[2Sam.20.19|2Sam 20:19]], read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂמוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>G iii. 264</sup> [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] (compare [[BDB#We|We]]) [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] and modern **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁלָּם‎</span> [[Isa.42.19|Isa 42:19]] ***one in covenant of peace*** (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>; but [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎משְׁלָם‎</span> ***their ruler***, so [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup>; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] and others ***one resigned*** (to God), read then <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָשְׁלָם‎</span>, compare √, Arabic IV.; [[BDB#Krochm|Krochm]] [[BDB#Gr|Grä]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁלָּחַי‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁלִ֫ימָה‎</span> [[Josh.10.4|Josh 10:4]]; [[Josh.11.19|Josh 11:19]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִשְׁלִ֫ימוּ‎</span> [[Josh.10.1|Josh 10:1]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁלִים‎</span> [[Isa.44.26|Isa 44:26]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַשְׁלִם‎</span> [[Prov.16.7|Prov 16:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּשְׁלֵם‎</span> [[1Kgs.22.45|1Kgs 22:45]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***make peace*** with, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת‎</span>, [[Josh.10.1|Josh 10:1]]; [[Josh.10.4|Josh 10:4]]; [[2Sam.10.19|2Sam 10:19]] = [[1Chr.19.19|1Chr 19:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span> [[Deut.20.12|Deut 20:12]]; [[1Kgs.22.45|1Kgs 22:45]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> pregnantly [[Josh.11.19|Josh 11:19]] ***submitting unto.*** 

**2.** ***cause to be at peace***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶת‎</span>, [[Prov.16.7|Prov 16:7]]. **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָשְׁלְאָה‎</span> [[Job.5.23|Job 5:23]] ***live in peace with***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ברית‎</span>).
